DLG ITM_7

DLG ITM_0
Gina: Hi! I'm Gina. I love autumn. That's the reason why I'm living in the middle of the forest. I love when September begins, sit down in my porch and look how the leaves start to fall down. 

DLG SPR_1
I'm a very old TV, you millennial! 

DLG ITM_1
Hey! Why don't you explore the house first? 

DLG SPR_0
Thomas: I'm a cat and I love fish. 

DLG ITM_2
This is the place where I come when I feel afraid or sad, when I need to scape from the real world. 

DLG ITM_3
This is your safe space too. If you are sick of the modern world, you could come here anytime you need it. 

DLG ITM_4
Just breathe and think about beautiful things :) 

DLG ITM_5
You could come every time you need it. 

DLG ITM_6
Just let's breathe together

DLG ITM_7
Problems are not forever. 

DLG SPR_2
Rabbit: Hi! How are you today?

VAR a
42
